verses.verse: וְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob הָלַ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went לְדַרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> on his way וַיִּפְגְּעוּ־ <S%H6293><s%> met ב֖וֹ מַלְאֲכֵ֥י <S%H4397><s%> and the angels אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> he said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> And when Jacob כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he רָאָ֔ם <S%H7200><s%> saw them מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> host אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> This [is] God's זֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> This וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> and he called שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of that place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מַֽחֲנָֽיִם׃ <S%H4266><s%> Mahanaim פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יַעֲקֹ֤ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob מַלְאָכִים֙ <S%H4397><s%> messengers לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> before him אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> to Esau אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> his brother אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> unto the land שֵׂעִ֖יר <S%H8165><s%> of Seir שְׂדֵ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> the country אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> of Edom

וַיְצַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> And he commanded אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> them saying כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹאמְר֔וּן <S%H559><s%> Thus shall ye speak לַֽאדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> unto my lord לְעֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> saith עַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> Thy servant יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with לָבָ֣ן <S%H3837><s%> with Laban גַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1481><s%> thus I have sojourned וָאֵחַ֖ר <S%H309><s%> and stayed there עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עָֽתָּה׃ <S%H6258><s%> now

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> have לִי֙ שׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> And I have oxen וַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> and asses צֹ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> flocks וְעֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> and menservants וְשִׁפְחָ֑ה <S%H8198><s%> and womenservants וָֽאֶשְׁלְחָה֙ <S%H7971><s%> and I have sent לְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> to tell לַֽאדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> my lord לִמְצֹא־ <S%H4672><s%> that I may find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight

וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> returned הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> And the messengers אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> to Jacob לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying בָּ֤אנוּ <S%H935><s%> We came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> to thy brother אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> and furthermore הֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and also he cometh לִקְרָֽאתְךָ֔ <S%H7125><s%> to meet thee וְאַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> and four מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> and four hundred אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיִּירָ֧א <S%H3372><s%> afraid יַעֲקֹ֛ב <S%H3290><s%> Then Jacob מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> was greatly וַיֵּ֣צֶר <S%H3334><s%> and distressed ל֑וֹ וַיַּ֜חַץ <S%H2673><s%> and he divided אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֹּ֧אן <S%H6629><s%> that [was] with him and the flocks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> and herds וְהַגְּמַלִּ֖ים <S%H1581><s%> and the camels לִשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> into two מַחֲנֽוֹת׃ <S%H4264><s%> bands

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> come עֵשָׂ֛ו <S%H6215><s%> If Esau אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> company הָאַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> to the one וְהִכָּ֑הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and smite it וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> then הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> then the other company הַנִּשְׁאָ֖ר <S%H7604><s%> which is left לִפְלֵיטָֽה׃ <S%H6413><s%> shall escape

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> said יַעֲקֹב֒ <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> O God אָבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> of my father אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham וֵאלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> and God אָבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> of my father יִצְחָ֑ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הָאֹמֵ֣ר <S%H559><s%> which saidst אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me שׁ֧וּב <S%H7725><s%> unto me Return לְאַרְצְךָ֛ <S%H776><s%> unto thy country וּלְמוֹלַדְתְּךָ֖ <S%H4138><s%> and to thy kindred וְאֵיטִ֥יבָה <S%H3190><s%> and I will deal well עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

קָטֹ֜נְתִּי <S%H6994><s%> I am not worthy of the least מִכֹּ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> of all הַחֲסָדִים֙ <S%H2617><s%> of all the mercies וּמִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣אֱמֶ֔ת <S%H571><s%> and of all the truth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֖יתָ <S%H6213><s%> which thou hast shewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servant כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> with בְמַקְלִ֗י <S%H4731><s%> for with my staff עָבַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H5674><s%> I passed over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <S%H3383><s%> this Jordan הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> and now הָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have become לִשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> and now I am become two מַחֲנֽוֹת׃ <S%H4264><s%> bands

הַצִּילֵ֥נִי <S%H5337><s%> Deliver me נָ֛א <S%H4994><s%> pray מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> I pray thee from the hand אָחִ֖י <S%H251><s%> of my brother מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> from the hand עֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָרֵ֤א <S%H3373><s%> for I fear אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> he יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> him lest he will come וְהִכַּ֔נִי <S%H5221><s%> and smite me אֵ֖ם <S%H517><s%> [and] the mother עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with בָּנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> the children

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You אָמַ֔רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> And thou saidst הֵיטֵ֥ב <S%H3190><s%> I will surely אֵיטִ֖יב <S%H3190><s%> do thee good עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> you וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <S%H7760><s%> and make אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֲךָ֙ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed כְּח֣וֹל <S%H2344><s%> as the sand הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִסָּפֵ֖ר <S%H5608><s%> which cannot be numbered מֵרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> for multitude

וַיָּ֥לֶן <S%H3885><s%> And he lodged שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> there that same night הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> and took מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַבָּ֧א <S%H935><s%> of that which came בְיָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> to his hand מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> a present לְעֵשָׂ֥ו <S%H6215><s%> for Esau אָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> his brother

עִזִּ֣ים <S%H5795><s%> she goats מָאתַ֔יִם <S%H3967><s%> Two hundred וּתְיָשִׁ֖ים <S%H8495><s%> he goats עֶשְׂרִ֑ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty רְחֵלִ֥ים <S%H7353><s%> ewes מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred וְאֵילִ֥ים <S%H352><s%> rams עֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty

גְּמַלִּ֧ים <S%H1581><s%> camels מֵינִיק֛וֹת <S%H3243><s%> milch וּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> with their colts שְׁלֹשִׁ֑ים <S%H7970><s%> Thirty פָּר֤וֹת <S%H6510><s%> kine אַרְבָּעִים֙ <S%H705><s%> forty וּפָרִ֣ים <S%H6499><s%> bulls עֲשָׂרָ֔ה <S%H6235><s%> and ten אֲתֹנֹ֣ת <S%H860><s%> she asses עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וַעְיָרִ֖ם <S%H5895><s%> foals עֲשָׂרָֽה׃ <S%H6235><s%> and ten

וַיִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> And he delivered בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> [them] into the hand עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants עֵ֥דֶר <S%H5739><s%> every drove עֵ֖דֶר <S%H5739><s%> drove לְבַדּ֑וֹ <S%H905><s%> itself וַ֤יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> by themselves and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> unto his servants עִבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> Pass over לְפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> before me וְרֶ֣וַח <S%H7305><s%> a space תָּשִׂ֔ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and put בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> betwixt עֵ֖דֶר <S%H5739><s%> drove וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> and עֵֽדֶר׃ <S%H5739><s%> every

וַיְצַ֥ו <S%H6680><s%> And he commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> the foremost לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When יִֽפְגָּשְׁךָ֞ <S%H6298><s%> meeteth thee עֵשָׂ֣ו <S%H6215><s%> When Esau אָחִ֗י <S%H251><s%> my brother וִשְׁאֵֽלְךָ֙ <S%H7592><s%> and asketh thee לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לְמִי־ <S%H4310><s%> to whom אַ֙תָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וְאָ֣נָה <S%H575><s%> and where תֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> going וּלְמִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> whom אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> thou? and whose [are] these before

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> Then thou shalt say לְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> [They be] thy servant לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob's מִנְחָ֥ה <S%H4503><s%> it [is] a present הִוא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he שְׁלוּחָ֔ה <S%H7971><s%> sent לַֽאדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> unto my lord לְעֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אַחֲרֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H310><s%> and behold also he [is] behind us

וַיְצַ֞ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded he גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> And so אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֵּׁנִ֗י <S%H8145><s%> the second גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> and the third גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַהֹ֣לְכִ֔ים <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after that הָעֲדָרִ֖ים <S%H5739><s%> the droves לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כַּדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> On this manner הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this תְּדַבְּר֣וּן <S%H1696><s%> shall ye speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> unto Esau בְּמֹצַאֲכֶ֖ם <S%H4672><s%> when ye find אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <S%H559><s%> And say ye גַּ֗ם <S%H1571><s%> moreover הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> Behold thy servant יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob אַחֲרֵ֑ינוּ <S%H310><s%> [is] behind us כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> For he said אֲכַפְּרָ֣ה <S%H3722><s%> I will appease פָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> him בַּמִּנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> with the present הַהֹלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> that goeth לְפָנָ֔י <S%H6440><s%> before me וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> and afterward כֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that אֶרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> I will see פָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> his face אוּלַ֖י <S%H194><s%> perhaps יִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> peradventure he will accept פָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> of me

וַתַּעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> over הַמִּנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> the present עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> before פָּנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> before him וְה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself לָ֥ן <S%H3885><s%> and himself lodged בַּלַּֽיְלָה־ <S%H3915><s%> that night הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> in the company

וַיָּ֣קָם ׀ <S%H6965><s%> And he rose up בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> that night ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> same וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֤י <S%H8147><s%> his two נָשָׁיו֙ <S%H802><s%> wives וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> and his two שִׁפְחֹתָ֔יו <S%H8198><s%> womenservants וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> a עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten יְלָדָ֑יו <S%H3206><s%> sons וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed over אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מַעֲבַ֥ר <S%H4569><s%> the ford יַבֹּֽק׃ <S%H2999><s%> Jabbok

וַיִּקָּחֵ֔ם <S%H3947><s%> And he took them וַיַּֽעֲבִרֵ֖ם <S%H5674><s%> and sent them over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנָּ֑חַל <S%H5158><s%> the brook וַֽיַּעֲבֵ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> and sent over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whatever לוֹ׃
